post:
Hello,

OneVPS.com is part of the Think Huge Ltd group, founded in 2012 and growing since. We began as a team of engineers determined to build reliable and robust servers, initially for our own use. Our passion for hardware soon spawned a fast growing business providing technology and infrastructure for tens of thousands of clients across the globe.

Our servers are housed in many of the most respected data centres in the world like Equinix or Interxion

Right now, there we have network and racks of servers humming away at:

  • New York
  • London
  • Tokyo
  • Zurich
  • Frankfurt
  • Amsterdam
  • Manchester

OneVPS.com is a culmination of the most talented engineers in the industry creating VPSí capable of maximising performance and adding real value for our clients. Our best pride is in customer focus, with instant support over ticketing or live chat. We will just sit, chat and work with you at any issues instantly.

Please use coupon code FOR2018 for a 10% OFF recurring during the checkout. Our default packages are below, however if you are looking for a custom one, please email us on sales@onevps.com

IPv6: 100+

All our VMs are running on a fully optimize network for activities such finances, forex, gaming, streaming, low latency to local providers in each location. The virtualization used is KVM with SolusVM panel. For more FAQ, please click here.

Best Regards,
Peter
